channel.name: Salesforce.com Adapter
channel.description:
Example showing salesforce.com adapter that we use internally within our own infra-structure.
http://help.interfaceware.com/v6/salesforce-com-adapter
This makes it super easy to do complex integrations with the popular CRM application salesforce.com.

from_http.commit_comment: Import Translators: Julian's Version of salesforce adapter.
